meanings.sent1: The boy wore a shirttailed shirt to the party.
meanings.sent2: Her shirttailed dress fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The shirttailed cat looked adorable with its tiny tail sticking out.
meanings.sent4: The shirttailed squirrel scurried up the tree with lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The shirttailed puppy wagged its tail happily as it played in the yard.

meanings.definition: To be connected or associated with someone or something more successful or powerful.
meanings.sent1: He shirttailed his way into the exclusive club by knowing the owner.
meanings.sent2: The ambitious entrepreneur shirttailed with a well-known investor to fund her project.
meanings.sent3: The comedian shirttailed with a famous actor for a hilarious skit.
meanings.sent4: She shirttailed her career to the top by networking with influential people.
meanings.sent5: The young artist shirttailed with a renowned painter to learn new techniques.
